com.att.research.xacml.std.pip

Class StdPIPResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.util.Wrapper<PIPResponse>
      • com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.StdPIPResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PIPResponse

    public class StdPIPResponse
extends Wrapper<PIPResponse>
implements PIPResponse
    Immutable implementation of the PIPResponse interface.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StdPIPResponse(Attribute attribute)
      Creates a new StdPIPResponse with an OK Status and a single Attribute.
      StdPIPResponse(java.util.Collection<Attribute> attributes)
      Creates a new StdPIPResponse with an OK Status and a copy of the given Collection of Attributes.
      StdPIPResponse(PIPResponse wrappedObjectIn)
      Creates a new immutable StdPIPResponse that wraps the given PIPResponse.
      StdPIPResponse(Status status)
      Creates a new StdPIPResponse with the given Status.

      Takes a PIPResponse that may contain Attributes, with multiple identifiers, each of which may contain multiple AttributeValues with different data types and creates a collection of simple PIPResponses that contain a single Attribute with AttributeValues of one data type.

      • getAttributes

        public java.util.Collection<Attribute> getAttributes()
        Description copied from interface: PIPResponse
        Gets the Collection of Attributes returned from a PIPEngine. The caller must not modify the returned Collection. The implementation is free to enforce this with unmodifiable collections.
        Specified by:
        getAttributes in interface PIPResponse
        Returns:
        The Collection of Attributes returned or an empty list if none are found

      • matches

        public static boolean matches(PIPRequest pipRequest,
              Attribute attribute)
        Determines if the given PIPRequest matches the given Attribute by comparing the category, attribute id, and if not null in the PIPRequest, the issuer.
        Parameters:
        pipRequest - the PIPRequest to compare against
        attribute - the Attribute to compare to
        Returns:
        true if the Attribute matches the PIPRequest else false

      • matchingValues

        public static java.util.Collection<AttributeValue<?>> matchingValues(PIPRequest pipRequest,
                                                     java.util.Collection<AttributeValue<?>> listAttributeValues)
        Gets the subset of the AttributeValues from the given Collection whose data type matches the data type in the given PIPRequest.
        Parameters:
        pipRequest - the PIPRequest to compare against
        listAttributeValues - the Collection of AttributeValues to select from
        Returns:
        a Collection of matching AttributeValues or null if there are no matches

      • getMatchingResponse

        public static PIPResponse getMatchingResponse(PIPRequest pipRequest,
                              PIPResponse pipResponse)
                                       throws PIPException
        Returns a PIPResponse that only contains the Attributes that match the given PIPRequest with AttributeValues that match the requested data type.
        Parameters:
        pipRequest -
        pipResponse -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PIPException

      • splitResponse

        public static java.util.Map<PIPRequest,PIPResponse> splitResponse(PIPResponse pipResponse)
                                                           throws PIPException
        Takes a PIPResponse that may contain Attributes, with multiple identifiers, each of which may contain multiple AttributeValues with different data types and creates a collection of simple PIPResponses that contain a single Attribute with AttributeValues of one data type.
        Parameters:
        pipResponse - the PIPResponse to split
        Returns:
        a Collection of simple PIPResponses
        Throws:
        PIPException - if there is an error splitting the response

      • isSimple

        public boolean isSimple()
        Description copied from interface: PIPResponse
        Determines if this PIPResponse is simple or not. A simple PIPResponse contains a single Attribute whose AttributeValues are all of the same data type.
        Specified by:
        isSimple in interface PIPResponse
        Returns:
        true if this PIPResponse is simple, else false.
